hackathon-description-text: InMobi Hack Day is InMobi's flagship hackathon on 11-12 Oct, 2014. So, if you want to implement your creative and unique ideas. Then, this is the place where you have 24 hours to build something amazing and celebrate your expression of creativity.
hackathon-requirements: Registrations are closed. Only selected teams are required to sumbit their hacks.
hackathon-rules: Casino night makes InMobi Hack Day a battle of mind and luck, which means being the winner hack team is one bit and playing well in casino night is the other bit. And, here is how the later bit works.
